name: The Manor on top of the Hill (TALP)
name_original: The Manor on top of the Hill (TALP)
description:
You just inherited a manor from your great-aunt who disappeared without a trace ten years ago. You didn't know her well, but your family remembers her as a very strange woman. What will you find in her mysterious, abandoned manor?

Made with Adventuron for Text Adventure Literacy Jam. No graphics, as ran out of time to make them. I'll probably make a more polished version with graphics and maybe a new chapter at some point after the jam, as I enjoyed making this!

Font: Parchment from https://damieng.com/typography/zx-origins/
